title: Bug 6758Class name corrupted by creating member class using wizard
description: Build 20011206 opened org.eclipse.ui.actions.DeleteResourceAction using new class wizard, created member class named DeleteProjectDialog as asubclass of MessageDialog (in org.eclipse.jface.dialogs) the result was:...public class DeleteResourceAction extends SelectionListenerAction {public class DeleteProjectDialog extends MessageDialog {}...Note the extra tab in DeleteResourceAction, and the strange formatting for thenew class.
OB: Bug 6758Class name corrupted by creating member class using wizard
